title: Hour 2: The Clumsy Criminal
description:
Anna Wolfe of Mississippi Today joins us as she continues her reporting on Brett Favre's involvement in the welfare fraud in her state. She discusses the most heinous elements of the scandal, generational poverty, morality vs. criminality, and more. Then, we can't stop talking about gambling, Billy has his useless sound montage, and we react to the images from Myles Garrett's car accident.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
